titleStmt.title: Description of A treatise on alchemy.

availability.licence: This metadata, accompanying images, and the content of London, British Library, Oriental Manuscripts Or 3659: A treatise on alchemy. are free of known copyright restrictions and in the public domain. notesStmt.note: Imperfect at the end and also within the text. Usage stains. Slight worming. Bound together with Or 3660.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Sefardi semi-cursive scripts of the 15th century.

binding.p: BM in-house. Spine: 'Em Ham-Melekh, Etc. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Oriental Mss. 3659. 3660.'

history.provenance:
Acquisition:
Jos[eph] Schlesinger: purchased by the British Museum from him on 02 March 1889: inscribed, folio (fse003v).
